commit message:
Use 'replace' instead of nested insert and replace causing an exception
(#309)

Do not process stats if one of the refs (from or to) are null, return an
error instead

Proper error handling when the reference does not exist when updating
the widget

Widgets do not need whole references but only 'other' data. Therefore we
retrieve an uncached partial current reference instead of geeting
'current' from the cache. This also ensures that 'current' in cache does
not get updated by widgets
Widget should always show speaking reference names
Add logging method to list all references in the store
Always create a current reference if none exists
